ud2.3:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud2.3:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula kumaraka antara ca savatthim antara ca jetavanam ahim dandena hananti.
ud2.3:1.4: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
ud2.3:1.5: Addasa kho bhagava sambahule kumarake antara ca savatthim antara ca jetavanam ahim dandena hanante.
ud2.3:2.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
